title: OpenGL Watch Faces
summary: A selection of Android Wear watch faces implemented using Open GL.
description: This application demonstrates a number of Android Wear watch faces with various animation effects.Effects include:Rotating texturesAnimations3D objectsEach face can be configured with a time piece; analogue or digital.More to come...Suggestions welcome.
descriptionHTML:
This application demonstrates a number of Android Wear watch faces with various animation effects.

Effects include:

Rotating textures
Animations
3D objects

Each face can be configured with a time piece; analogue or digital.

More to come...

Suggestions welcome.
comments: Can you please add an 12 hours mode?
